General.Name: Phu Nhuan Jewelry JSC
General.Description: Phu Nhuan Jewelry Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, retails, trades in, imports, and exports gold, silver, jewelry, gemstones, fashion accessories, and souvenirs in Vietnam. It offers its products under the CAO Fine Jewellery, PNJ Gold, PNJ Silver, Style By PNJ, Disney|PNJ, PNJ Art, and PNJ Watch brands through stores and online. The company also trades in watches; and inspection services for diamonds, gems, and precious metals under PNJ Lab brand name. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
